New Records: Bobby Witt Jr. became the first player in Royals history with consecutive 30-home run seasons
Key Match Events: Yordan Alvarez led off with a home run to right
Jon Singleton hit a two-run homer to right to give Houston a 3-0 lead
Bobby Witt Jr. hit a solo shot into the Crawford Boxes in the seventh inning
Post-Match Reflections: We didn’t come out of here with any wins. That’s what we play for is to win every day. That stinks
I think what’s important for us is to just flush the series and move on to the next
It’s a little bit of a tough stretch, but hopefully, we get back home, get back in our environment and do what we do at home
Miscellaneous Highlights: Alec Marsh pitched well and Bobby Witt Jr. hit his 30th home run of the season
Kansas City fell 3 1/2 games behind the Guardians in the AL Central
The Royals were swept for just the second time this season and swept in a four-game series for the first time since losing four straight to Boston on June 28-July 1, 2021, at Fenway Park
Others: Kansas City heads back home on a five-game slide
